snippet.title: "Crossed Paths" BL/Yaoi/Bara Visual Novel (Official Promotional Video)
snippet.description:
Story:
When David Rivera moved to New York, his long-sought-after dream came true. But what happens when you have achieved all your life goals? Sometimes you need a small push to be able to move on and find new dreams to pursue.

…Which for David appear in the shape of three guys, three paths that cross with his in the streets of the big city, each one with his own story and dreams. Which one of them will David choose?




Hello everyone! This is our first BL/Yaoi visual novel project ever and we really hope that you will enjoy the game as much as we do! Crossed Paths is a full visual novel game with multiple routes and endings that you can choose based on these 3 sexy guys. You will go through some sexy scene and embrace the romance between the characters too.


SUPPORT OUR KICKSTARTER PAGE HERE!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/crossed-paths/crossed-paths-yaoi-bl-visual-novel

Check out our itch page
https://yayuro.itch.io/crossed-paths

Follow us on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/Yayuro5
